Subject: Re: RebelYell tries to make contact.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::RebelYell::
RebelYell picks up a laser welder and walks to where
Shadow Wing is working. As he starts to weld the sides
he asks "Has there been much Pred activity lately? I
hope so, cause I really wanna slag some Preds!!"
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> "No, it will never fly again. But we are hoping it
> will survive 
> another pred attack."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::RebelYell::
> > RebelYell looked at the ship and could not believe
> his
> > optic sensors. He turned to Spears. "No
> offense,but
> > you dont actually expect that thing to ever fly
> again
> > do you??"
> > --- logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Spears::
> > > 
> > > She stood up and looked at the newcomer. "I'm
> > > Spears. Pleased to meet 
> > > you. You can take your stuff down there to the
> other
> > > bots and help 
> > > with repairs.  We can use all the help we can
> get. 
> > > The pred on thier 
> > > last attack took a huge chunk out of our poor
> ship."
> > > She pointed down to Shadow Wing and Lunarpine.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> > > <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > > > :RebelYell:
> > > > 
> > > >  RebelYell had been flying for several hours
> when
> > > off
> > > > in the distance he spotted a ship."Must be it"
> he
> > > > thought.As he got closer he saw a bot sitting
> at
> > > the
> > > > entrance.When he landed he dropped the parts
> he
> > > had
> > > > been carrying on the ground."I'm RebelYell,"
> he
> > > said.
> > > > "Now could somebody tell me what the hell is
> goin'
> > > on
> > > > on this slaggin' rock??"
> > > > --- logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > > > ::Shadow Wing/Spears::
> > > > > 
> > > > > Shadow Wing::
> > > > > She walked out of the ship and saw Spears
> > > sitting at
> > > > > the entrance 
> > > > > looking like she was deep in thought. "Hey,
> you
> > > OK?"
> > > > > 
> > > > > Spears::
> > > > > She turned with a little suprize. She
> relaxed
> > > and
> > > > > smiled,"Geez, you 
> > > > > startled me."  She chuckled, "yeah, I'm
> fine."
> > > > > 
> > > > > Shadow Wing::
> > > > > "OK, so what's on your mind? You looked like
> you
> > > > > were taking a trip 
> > > > > back to Cybertron." She said with half a
> > > chuckle.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Spears::
> > > > > "yeah, but not in this pile of rusted bolts.
> > > This
> > > > > ship is so damaged, 
> > > > > it wouldn'tfly again even if we replaced
> > > everything
> > > > > onboard down to 
> > > > > the paper clips in the captain's desk. The
> ark
> > > is
> > > > > grounded for good. 
> > > > > And all we can do is sit here and repair
> parts
> > > of it
> > > > > just enough to 
> > > > > survive another pred attack." She gave a
> deep
> > > sigh.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Shadow Wing::
> > > > > She put a comforting hand on Spears
> shoulder. 
> > > > > "Don't worry, 
> > > > > everything will work out.  You'll see." She
> > > smiled
> > > > > at Spears and 
> > > > > walked down the ramp.  She had another
> welding
> > > torch
> > > > > with her.  She 
> > > > > walked up to Lunarpine, "Hello beloved."  
> > > > > 
> > > > >
